overview:
Rodney specializes in Visual Communications with a background in graphic design and illustration, but an emphasis on successful cross media communication.

To put it simply, he is emphatic about illustration, graphic design, web standards/development, multimedia production, multilingual education and services.

Rodney assists and coaches people to communicate their message effectively, across psychological, technological, language and cultural barriers through visual/logical design, and imaginative presentation strategy.

He has a passion for communicating ideas via effective use of these language, media or other creative tools. Specialties

User interface design and development, illustration, Japanese language, English as Second Language coaching
